title: Put large content in text item, the tips shows the content in one line
description: When a large amount of content is put in a text item, the expected behavior is for the tips to display the content in a given format. However, the observed behavior is that the tips show the content in one line.
OB: The tips show the content in one line instead of the expected format.
EB: The tips should display the content in the expected format, providing enough information for the user to identify the error.
SR: Steps to Reproduce: 1. Insert a text in the layout and input the following content: 'Contents1. MINOR ENHANCEMENTS 32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMETNDEFN CLASS 32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS 32.3 REVIEW RESULT 32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT. CURRENTLY, WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTYFILE. NEW FEATURES 53.1 RHINO EXPRESSION PARSER 53.2 STRUCTURE TYPE SUPPORT 63.3 NEW SYSTEM 64. QA TEST SUPPORTING 7'.
